Description: Lip, wall and handle-root sherd of East Greek (North Ionian?) pottery bowl; interior glazed dark brown; exterior: narrow band at lip and broader one on mid-wall, on which an inscription is cut.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), temenos (said to be)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.851)
